description: libvirt uses local_gb for secondary drives while XenServer uses it to calculate the space used for the primary drive. We need to figure out a way to make this consistent between all hypervisors. Also need to look at how the other hypervisors use this as well.
title: local_gb is not used consistently between hypervisors
